attributes.action: Please help save this valuable service in Hartlepool.  We need your help.
attributes.additional_details:
Support is available either in small Parent and Toddler Groups that promote quality interactive experiences between parents and their children. They can provide support within the home environment. To many this is needed more than ever. PATCH Family Support also provides activities during the school holidays, at a very small cost to families. 
They train members of the public to help volunteer in the community, many of these are now employed. 
www.patchfamilysupport.co.uk
attributes.background: PATCH Family Support has been running for more than 20 years and has provided families in Hartlepool with support, training, advice, Home Safety Equipment and so much more.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
